snippet.title: Shikari Rising Trailer
snippet.description:
An Action Adventure 2d metroidvania style game with emphasis on real time battle between relentless and merciless enemies and EPIC bosses.
Play the demo here: https://blossum-games.itch.io/shikari-rising/devlog/235701/shikari-rising-free-demo
Early Access Available now @ https://blossum-games.itch.io/shikari-rising
Official website: http://shikari-rising.com/
